block.p: RIZOWY - Charlotte. American Friends of The Hebrew University deeply mourns the passing of Charlotte Rizowy, wife of our esteemed colleague Dr. Carlos G. Rizowy, Senior Development Director for the Midwest. On behalf of AFHU, we extend our deepest condolences to Carlos, their children, Brian Isaac, Yael Deborah, Michal Evie and the entire family. American Friends of The Hebrew University Ira Lee Sorkin, President Keith L. Sachs, Chairman of the Board Adam B. Kahan, Executive Vice President Todd S. Lundy, President, Chicago Chapter Lawrence E. Glick, Chairman, Chicago Executive Committee

RIZOWY - Charlotte. American Friends of The Hebrew University deeply mourns the passing of Charlotte Rizowy, wife of our esteemed colleague Dr. Carlos G. Rizowy, Senior Development Director for the Midwest. On behalf of AFHU, we extend our deepest condolences to Carlos, their children, Brian Isaac, Yael Deborah, Michal Evie and the entire family.
